prompt: What is the full name of EdUHK
answer: The Education University of Hong Kong

prompt: What is the best way to enter Cantonese characters on your mobile phone?
answer: TypeDuck is a Cantonese input method that allows you to type characters based on standard Jyutping spelling. It also provides multilingual prompts that help you choose the right words from the homophones!
